vogue.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a popular and fashionable style, activity, method etc
vogue.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Suntanning first came into vogue in the mid-1930s.
Short skirts are very much in vogue just now.
the vogue for large families in the pre-war years
vogue.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a fashion magazine for women, which includes photographs of expensive clothes and articles about new fashions, health, and beauty
